## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | The recommended order size of 15,000 units ensures sufficient stock to cover forecasted demand with a margin of error, while utilizing a vendor order quantity that minimizes lead time. This approach balances meeting demand with minimizing stock holding costs and potential obsolescence due to shelf life. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The player has not planned to order any units. This recommendation helps to avoid potential stockouts by proactively replenishing inventory based on forecasted demand.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 10 days (Calculated: Current Stock / Average Daily Demand) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 7 days (Calculated: Current Stock + Recommended Order Size / Forecasted Demand) |
| Comments                          | The recommended order size accounts for the lead time of 1 day and anticipates slight variations in sales. It is also aligned with a vendor order quantity that allows for efficient replenishment. This approach helps to optimize inventory levels and minimize stockouts. |
